record.title: ADJOURNMENT TO TUESDAY, NOVEMBER 13, 2007
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT TO TUESDAY, NOVEMBER 13, 2007 -- (House of Representatives - November 09, 2007)

[Page: H13510]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that when the House adjourns today, it adjourn to meet at 10:30 a.m. on Tuesday next for morning-hour debate.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Maryland?
